headline: Electronic Arts lays off hundreds of workers in latest round of cuts
summary: The video game company's latest workforce reduction also hit its subsidiary Respawn Entertainment, the studio behind popular games Apex Legends and Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order.

raw.headline: Electronic Arts lays off hundreds of workers in latest round of cuts
raw.summary: The video game company's latest workforce reduction also hit its subsidiary Respawn Entertainment, the studio behind popular games Apex Legends and Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order.

headline: Unlocking Q4 Potential of Electronic Arts (EA): Exploring Wall Street Estimates for Key Metrics
summary: Beyond analysts' top -and-bottom-line estimates for Electronic Arts (EA), evaluate projections for some of its key metrics to gain a better insight into how the business might have performed for the quarter ended March 2025.

headline: 1 Safe-and-Steady Stock on Our Watchlist and 2 to Turn Down
summary: Stability is great, but low-volatility stocks may struggle to deliver market-beating returns over time as they sometimes underperform during bull markets.
